caption.center: ROSE KONECNY, Personal Representative of the ESTATE OF CHARLES HEMMINGER,
and LAWRENCE W. NEWMEYER, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. JUDITH ZOCK and

opinion.opinion_text:
COA: 224630, Allegan PC: 90-046014-CG
On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's order of October 29, 2002 is considered, and it is DENIED, because it does not appear that the order was entered erroneously.
